org.apache.ctakes.ytex.kernel.pagerank

Interface PageRankService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PageRankServiceImpl

    public interface PageRankService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double[] rank(Map<String,Double> dampingVector, ConceptGraph cg)
      call rank() with default values for iter (30), threshold(1e-4), dampingFactor(0.85)

    • Method Detail

      • rank

        double[] rank(Map<String,Double> dampingVector,
              ConceptGraph cg,
              int iter,
              double threshold,
              double dampingFactor)
        PageRank for conceptGraph. Page = concept. in-links = parents. out-links = children.
        Parameters:
        dampingVector - topic vector/personalized pagerank vector. If null will use normal pagerank with a damping vector where every value is 1/N
        cg - concept graph
        iter - max number of iterations
        threshold - convergence threshold
        dampingFactor -
        Returns:
        pageRank 'vector'. key = concept (page), value = rank

      • rank

        double[] rank(Map<String,Double> dampingVector,
              ConceptGraph cg)
        call rank() with default values for iter (30), threshold(1e-4), dampingFactor(0.85)
        Parameters:
        dampingVector -
        cg -
        Returns:
